HOME.JOIN: Join the catalog for free here

CATALOGUE.TOP_TEXT: The OWOD catalog is a digital directory referencing all designers across multiple design disciplines.

DASHBOARD.BIO_WARN: Your biography will not be automatically translated into English or French. If you wish to be visible to both English and French audiences, we recommend writing your biography in both languages.

LOGIN.BIENVENUE: Welcome ! Enter your information to access your member area.

REGISTER.CONSENT_1: I agree that my data will be collected and used in accordance with the

MON_COMPTE.INFO_1: You haven't created your designer profile yet.
MON_COMPTE.INFO_2: To create it, fill in the minimal information below.
MON_COMPTE.INFO_3: You can then edit or complete your profile by accessing your dashboard.

PHOTO.EXPLICATION_1: To ensure visual harmony on the site, we ask you to upload a photo with a transparent background. You can easily remove the background from your photo using this site:
PHOTO.EXPLICATION_2: It will only take a few seconds!
PHOTO.EXPLICATION_3: We also encourage you to choose a square-format photo where you are visible from the front, from head to waist. These guidelines help ensure a consistent and aesthetic presentation of the site.
PHOTO.EXPLICATION_4: Thank you for your understanding and cooperation!

ABOUT.P1: The AIPDA (International Alliance for the Promotion of Design in Africa) is an organization that promotes design as a strategic tool for sustainable development and innovation in Africa.
ABOUT.P2_1: The world is witnessing a paradigm shift in politics, culture, economy, society, and the environment.
ABOUT.P2_2: Africa is emerging and realizing its strengths through its dynamic youth, diaspora, and committed citizens.
ABOUT.P2_3: We deemed it relevant to establish a public utility design organization to address Africa's challenges.
ABOUT.MISSION_PRINCIPALE_TEXTE: Strengthening the presence of Design in Africa and its diasporic territories while supporting stakeholders.
ABOUT.DIFFUSER_TEXTE: Making design more than just an aesthetic process, but a strategic asset.
ABOUT.RENFORCER_TEXTE: Establishing educational programs and integrating design excellence.
ABOUT.CONTRIBUER_TEXTE: Using design principles to foster progress and improve quality of life.

1.TEXTE: OWOD is a collaborative platform initiated by the AIPDA to connect African designers and their diaspora.

2.TEXTE: Anyone interested in African design can join the platform.

3.TITRE: How do I register on OWOD?

4.TEXTE: Online portfolio, networking, project calls, and resource library.

5.TEXTE: OWOD offers a free version with basic features.

6.TITRE: Can I share personal projects on the platform?
6.TEXTE: Yes, OWOD encourages sharing personal projects.

7.TITRE: How does OWOD promote African design?
7.TEXTE: OWOD highlights African and diasporic creators.

8.TITRE: What should I do in case of technical issues?

9.TITRE: How is my personal data protected?
9.TEXTE: Your data is protected in compliance with GDPR.

10.TITRE: How can I join AIPDA as a member?

11.TITRE: Can I propose ideas or suggestions for OWOD?

12.TITRE: What types of content are prohibited on OWOD?
12.TEXTE: OWOD prohibits illegal or offensive content.

13.TITRE: Are there events organized through OWOD?
13.TEXTE: OWOD organizes webinars, workshops, and competitions.

14.TITRE: How can I report abuse or inappropriate content?
14.TEXTE: Report content via the 'Report' button or contact info@aipda-design.org.

15.TITRE: Is OWOD accessible from a smartphone?
15.TEXTE: OWOD is mobile-friendly, and an app is under development.

FAQ.AUTRE: For any other question, don't hesitate to contact us at: info@aipda-design.org.

EDITOR.TITLE: 1. Site Publisher
EDITOR.CONTENT_1: The OWOD platform is published by AIPDA (International Alliance for the Promotion of Design in Africa), a non-profit organization registered under French law with registration number W772011095, located at 62 Avenue de Meaux, 77000 Melun.
EDITOR.CONTENT_2: Director of publication: Élie Kouamé, President of AIPDA.

HOST.TITLE: 2. Site Hosting
HOST.CONTENT: The OWOD platform is hosted by Heroku. Website: https://www.heroku.com/
HOST.CONTENT_3: Address : 415 Mission Street, 94105 San Francisco, CA, United States

INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY.TITLE: 3. Intellectual Property
INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY.CONTENT: All content on the OWOD platform is the exclusive property of AIPDA or their respective authors and is protected by applicable laws.

PERSONAL_DATA.TITLE: 4. Personal Data
PERSONAL_DATA.CONTENT: AIPDA is committed to protecting your data in accordance with GDPR. You can contact info@aipda-design.org to exercise your rights.

LIABILITY.TITLE: 5. Liability
LIABILITY.CONTENT: AIPDA cannot guarantee the accuracy of the content and is not liable for any damages resulting from the site's use.

HYPERLINKS.TITLE: 6. Hyperlinks
HYPERLINKS.CONTENT: The platform may contain links to third-party websites. AIPDA is not responsible for their content.

MODIFICATIONS.TITLE: 7. Modifications to Legal Notice
MODIFICATIONS.CONTENT: AIPDA reserves the right to modify this legal notice at any time.

APPLICABLE_LAW.TITLE: 8. Governing Law
APPLICABLE_LAW.CONTENT: This legal notice is governed by French law. Disputes will be resolved by French courts.
